text: Nathan Colbert Jr. (April 9, 1946 â€“ January 5, 2023) was an American baseball player. He played as a first baseman. He played in Major League Baseball (MLB) from 1966 to 1976. He most notably played for the San Diego Padres from 1969 to 1974. He also played for the Houston Astros, Detroit Tigers, Montreal Expos and the Oakland Athletics. Colbert was born in St. Louis, Missouri. He was married to Kasey. The couple had nine children together. Colbert died on January 5, 2023, in Las Vegas, Nevada. He was 76. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1946 births Category:2023 deaths Category:African- American baseball players Category:Detroit Tigers players Category:Houston Astros players Category:Montreal Expos players Category:National League All- Stars Category:Oakland Athletics players Category:San Diego Padres players Category:Sportspeople from St. Louis, Missouri
title: Nate Colbert
